page.title: 11Services for Sarn
page.content: The{Post Office}is part of someone's house and it is only open on Tuesday, Thursday,Friday and Saturday. Pentrehyling Stores deliver{bread}once a week.Every Wednesday the{Dustman} comes round to collect your rubbish, and they take it to a factory or a dumpyard.The{Milkman}comes round delivering milk on Mondays,Wednesdays, and Fridays.On Tuesday the{Bus}comes through Sarn to pick up old people at 10.30am.{Sarn Garage}has just been taken over by some new people. Sometimes the new owner takes his big articulated lorry transporting any thing from one place to another.The{ {Coalman}comes every fortnight on a Monday.The{Mobile Grocery Van}delivers groceries every Friday to the council houses.There is a telephone kiosk by the school.
